data.message: Seekin a regal sequil with the eye of an eagle,people are feeble,your half as equal,pop goes the weasel,its legal to be lethal,the meek will mosh,I'm dellusional stuck in a mirage,hit you with a barrage like a 3 round burst,they say my gift is a curse, I'll strike first, put your verse in a herse,give you my vision,dont listen  end up in critical condition,stop bitchin an check the mission,got a trick up my sleeve like a magician,on a collision course for the source,return to sender,I'll see ya at the end of september,cold as the rain in november,on another bender gettin smashed like fenders,eattin these great pretenders,with no credentials not even the potential,claiming to be mental,you dont even compare,get the fuck outta here, beware theres no cure,dont get controlled by fear,fuckin with me could be fatal havnt been stable since i was in the cradle.
